## Constants

```go
const (
    ILLEGAL = "ILLEGAL"
    EOF     = "EOF"

    DATATYPE = "DATATYPE"

    // Identifiers
    IDENT = "IDENT"

    // Literals
    INT    = "INT"
    STRING = "STRING"
    BOOL   = "BOOL"
    NULL   = "NULL"

    // Operators
    ASSIGN   = "="
    PLUS     = "+"
    MINUS    = "-"
    BANG     = "!"
    ASTERISK = "*"
    SLASH    = "/"

    LT  = "<"
    GT  = ">"

    EQ     = "=="
    NOT_EQ = "!="

    // Delimiters
    COMMA     = ","
    SEMICOLON = ";"
    COLON     = ":"

    LPAREN = "("
    RPAREN = ")"
    LBRACE = "{"
    RBRACE = "}"

    // Keywords
    FUNCTION = "FUNCTION"
    VAR      = "VAR"
    TRUE     = "TRUE"
    FALSE    = "FALSE"
    IF       = "IF"
    ELSE     = "ELSE"
    RETURN   = "RETURN"
)
```

### func [LookupIdent](<https://github.com/divshekhar/DevScript/blob/main/src/token/token.go#L78>)

```go
func LookupIdent(ident string) TokenType
```

returns Keyword Specific token if the identifier is a keyword
